verses.1: No thuman mite aw, Topa tungah lungdam un! Pahtawina pen thutangte tawh kilawm kituak hi.
verses.2: Laiza khausai lasakna tawh Topa phat unla, harp zang sawm khausai lasakna tawh ama tungah la ngaih sa un.
verses.3: Ama tungah la thak sa unla, a gingpha mahmah in hoihtakin khausai tum un.
verses.4: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa thutang a, ama hihna khempeuh thuman tawh a sem hi.
verses.5: Amah in thuman le thutang deih a, leitungah Topaʼ itna kip a kidim hi.
verses.6: Topaʼ kampauna tawh vantung piang a, a kam pan a husanna tawh vantung nate a piang hi.
verses.7: Amah in tuipi tuite thawl khat sunga thun bangin mun khat ah gawm a, tui thukpite tuibeem ah a koih hi.
verses.8: Leitung khempeuh in Topa zahtak uh henla, leitung a teengte khempeuh, amah lamdangsakna tawh ding ta uh hen!
verses.9: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pau a, leitung hong piang hi; amah in thu pia a, na khempeuh hong om hi.
verses.10: Topa in minamteʼ thungaihsutna a mawkna suahin, miteʼ geelna a khaktan hi.
verses.11: Topaʼ thungaihsutna kip ngitnget a, ama lungsim ngaihsutna khang tawntungin a kip hi.
verses.12: Topa, Pasian-a a nei minam, ama luah dingin teelna a ngah minamte thupha ngah ahi hi.
verses.13: Topa in vantung panin hong en suk a, mihing khempeuh a mu hi.
verses.14: A tutna mun panin amah hong dak khia-in, leitung mite a en hi.
verses.15: Amauʼ lungsim a bawlpa in amauteʼ gamtatnate en gige hi.
verses.16: Kumpi khat a galkap tampite in suaktasak zo lo a, galkap hang pa ama hatna tawh kihon khia zo lo hi.
verses.17: Sakol galkapte pen gualzawh nadingin a mawkna lametna hi a, amauʼ hatna tawh hon zo lo hi.
verses.18: Amah a zahtakte, a itna kip lametna a neite, sihna panin hon khia-in, kialpi hun sungin amaute a hin kep theih nadingin Topa in amaute en tawntung hi.
verses.20: Topa i ngak hi; amah pen eite hong huhpa le i lum ahi hi.
verses.21: Ama min siangtho eite in muang ihih manin ama sungah i lungdam hi.
verses.22: Topa aw, nang kong lamet uh mah bangin koteʼ tungah na itna kip hong omsak in.
